item.title: Police officers charged with murder of Kenyan blogger
item.description: Albert Ojwang died in police custody after being detained for allegedly defaming the deputy police chief.

item.title: Wreck of sunken $30m yacht Bayesian to be examined
item.description: Tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch and daughter were among seven people killed when boat went down off coast of Italy.

item.title: Watch: Video shows aftermath of Israeli strikes on Iran
item.description: Footage has emerged showing smoke billowing over Tehran and the city of Karaj, west of the capital.

item.title: First celestial image unveiled from revolutionary telescope
item.description: The telescope should detect killer asteroids and may even find the ninth planet in our solar system.

item.title: Israel says it struck Tehran's Evin prison and Fordo access routes
item.description: Iran's judiciary says the attack damaged parts of Evin, a notorious facility which holds many political prisoners.
